title: [BUG] Family name of type face is empty in AWS Elastic beanstalk.
body:
**Description**

Family name of type face is empty in AWS Elastic beanstalk.

**Code**

SKFontStyleWeight sKFontStyleWeight = SKFontStyleWeight.Normal;
SKFontStyleSlant sKFontStyleSlant = SKFontStyleSlant.Upright;
SKFontStyleWidth sKFontStyleWidth = SKFontStyleWidth.Normal;
SKPaint paint = new SKPaint();
paint.TextSize = 11f;
paint.Color = new SKColor(Convert.ToByte(0), Convert.ToByte(0), Convert.ToByte(0));
paint.Typeface = SKTypeface.FromFamilyName("Times New Roman", sKFontStyleWeight, sKFontStyleWidth, sKFontStyleSlant); 


**Expected Behavior**

Family name of the typeface is valid font name 

**Actual Behavior**

Family name of the typeface  is empty 

**Basic Information**

- NuGet: **SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux.NoDependencies** 
- Version with issue:  **2.88.2**
- IDE:  **Visual Studio 2022**
- Platform Target Frameworks: **ASP.NET Core application with .NET 5.0 framework**
- Environment : **AWS Elastic beanstalk**
  
**Note**
1. This code works properly in windows.
2. If we used SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux (2.88.2 ) NuGet instead of SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux.NoDependencies (2.88.2 ) NuGet ,we faced following exception in AWS Elastic beanstalk

System.TypeInitializationException: The type initializer for 'SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo' threw an exception. ---> System.DllNotFoundException: Unable to load shared library 'libSkiaSharp' or one of its dependencies.
